Predict.py documentation¶

Access this file from the FLASK folder. This files predicts the outcome of the model. It consists of certain preprocessing steps which are fundamental in recieving clean and appropriate outcomes. It converts the raw output model to a structured format.

predict.get_mapping(sentence, meta_file, model_bert)¶

Maps the words to the tokens and returns the predictions of each tag.

Parameters

  • sentence – Recieves the tokenized sentence, defaults to none

  • meta_file – Meta file from the config.py, defaults to none

  • model_bert – NER BERT model from config.py, defaults to none

Returns

final_info: returns key information that must be extracted

Return type

dictionary

predict.get_tokens(tokenized_sentence, tags, tags_name, enc_tag)¶

This function extracts tokens for the words in the sentences.

Parameters

  • tokenized_sentence – Recieves the sentences once it is tokenized, defaults to none

  • tags – It is the annotated tag that have to be predicted, defaults to none

  • tags_name – It is the tag name with the POS included, defaults to none

  • enc_tag – It recieves the encoded tag, defaults to none

Returns

map_: returns encoded tokens of each word

Return type

dictionary
